snippet.title: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: In the Belly of the Beast (SAGE 2021 Trailer)
snippet.description:
Here's the SAGE 2021 trailer for episode 2 of the Sonic SatAM RPG series!

Check out our SAGE booth at: https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-the-hedgehog-rpg-in-the-belly-of-the-beast.1038/
